title: 820-00875 are C8503 and C8504 important?
message:
I have a 820-00875 with a burned hole under the caps C8503 and C8504.
I fixed this and the board is running. Only these two caps are still missing.
Can I leave out the capacitors or are they important? The pads of PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT are completely gone.
